溢.definition: to overflow; (literary) excessive; old variant of 鎰|镒[yi4]

溢價.definition: premium; to charge or pay a premium

溢出.definition: to overflow; to spill over; (computing) overflow

溢於言表.definition: to exhibit one's feelings in one's speech

溢流孔.definition: bleed hole; overflow pipe; spill vent
